name: for my friends
description:
hi! this is a game i made just to test how bitsy works, and to get sentimental on my friends (again).  i really do owe them a lot - even the fact that i'm not scared to plan to make games professionally one day. i'm kind of embarrassed to put this as public, but i promised someone (yeah, you guessed it... a friend) that i'll fight this fear. so here it is! and thanks for playing!

oh, and i also tried making a complete (but very small) audio track for the first time! and for the first time my music sounds... bearable even if it doesn't completely fit!!
